phases.name: Remove Google Button
phases.description: Remove non-functional Google Sign-in button from login page

subtasks.description: Remove 'Continue with Google' button and related code from LoginPage.tsx

verification.run: Open login page in browser - verify Google button is removed, email/password login still works, no console errors

subtasks.notes: Removed Google Sign-In button and related code from LoginPage.tsx. Removed GoogleIcon import, handleGoogleLogin function, divider with 'or' text, and the 'Continue with Google' button. Also removed unused Divider import. Code is clean and follows existing patterns.

issues_found.description: None - All static analysis checks passed. Manual browser verification required before deployment.
